Localization.Name: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Localization.Description: This Earth-based company is responsible for hard-hitting array of ship weapons.

English.Name: Gallenson Tactical Systems
English.Description: This Earth-based company is responsible for hard-hitting array of ship weapons.

Localization.Name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 3 Cannon
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 3

Fed by Gallenson Tactical’s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk3 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.
